DocAttribute.Name: Elements
DocAttribute.Documentation: The geometric elements which make up the geometric set, these may be points, curves or surfaces; but are required to be of the same coordinate space dimensionality.

DocAttribute.Name: Dim
DocAttribute.Documentation: The space dimensionality of this class, it is identical to the first element in the set. A where rule ensures that all elements have the same dimensionality.

DocWhereRule.Name: ConsistentDim
DocWhereRule.Documentation: All elements within a geometric set shall have the same dimensionality.
